ORY

ORY Sites

Advanced, effortless website builder!

Download
OSX

Download
Windows

Download
Linux

ORY Sites is a website builder written in React with great user experience that does not require any programming experience. It works like a static site generator, but visually engaging and easy to use.

Exporting an ORY Sites project results in a static website that uses HTML, CSS and JavaScript only. No databases, no Apache, pure HTML. A static website can be hosted anywhere (GitHub Pages, AWS S3, Google Cloud), can not be hacked and loads blazingly fast, on average between 5-30ms, and about 500ms to first render, depending on plugins used.

Pricing

ORY Sites is currently available as an early access product and is available for free.

Our Story

We have been running the Wikipedia for Learning for close to a decade now, with the goal to engage individuals around the world to make themselves and their knowledge visible. We thought there must be a way to make it easier for everyone to create content online but stay independent at the same time.

As a result, we built the ORY Editor, an open source technology for creating engaging content in a visual, easy way. On top of this technology we present: ORY Sites - our next generation website builder.

If you are interested in our other popular open source solutions, check out ORY at GitHub.com.
